virtual void Util::OStream::write ( Mode  m,
const void *  data,
size_t  count 
) [pure virtual]

Write unformatted bytes This method is called when all formatted data has been converted for heterogeneous communication. This method may be overloaded by derived class.

Parameters:
m [in] the mode of access (immediate or differed)
data [in] the pointer to the data to communicate
count [in] the number of formatted items to write

Implemented in Util::OStream2std_ostream, Util::OStream2fd, and Net::OStream.
